```{r}

reallyWeirdProjects = weirdProjects[weirdProjects$fh_p + weirdProjects$p_fh != 0,]

reallyReallyWeirdProjects = weirdProjects[weirdProjects$c_fh != weirdProjects$m_fh || weirdProjects$m_fh != weirdProjects$p_fh || weirdProjects$c_fh != weirdProjects$p_fh,]
```
